sentences.en: Ample in the mouth with good sweetness and youthful tannin.
sentences.cn: 香甜口感与尚且年轻的单宁充盈口腔.

sentences.en: Astringent: Mouth - puckering sensation ; the result of tannin being present in the wine.
sentences.cn: 麻辣: 由于丹宁在葡萄酒中的作用而使喉间受到强烈刺激的感觉.

sentences.en: Coffee contains tannin and antioxidants, which are good for the heart and arteries, Dr Trombetti says.
sentences.cn: 特龙贝蒂说，咖啡中含有丹宁酸和抗氧化剂，对心脏和动脉有好处。

sentences.en: Dark red elegant wine , spicy 、 peppery nose with well balanced tannin.
sentences.cn: 深红色佳酿,嗅觉带有强烈的调味品和胡椒味,单宁均衡.

sentences.en: Fine tannin with sweet touches in the finale.
sentences.cn: 极好的单宁,带者美妙的甜味收结.

sentences.en: Full - bodied a solid, good tannin structure and apersistent aftertaste.
sentences.cn: 酒体丰腴,单宁结实而精致, 回味持久.

sentences.en: Gallotannin is an important part of vegetable tannin.
sentences.cn: 没食子单宁是植物单宁的重要分支.

sentences.en: Kinetic characteristics of valonia tannin biodegradation using natural microorganism groups were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了微生物菌系对橡单宁的生物降解能力.
柔和: 滑爽,不含太多的单宁.

sentences.en: Tannin inclusions in vacuoles have also been demonstrated by the electron microscope.
sentences.cn: 液泡中的丹宁内含物也已用显微镜证实.

sentences.en: Tannin is an astringent substance used in medicine.
sentences.cn: 单宁酸在医药中用作收敛性的物质.

sentences.en: Taste sweet, structure clear, soft tannin, long memorable aftertaste.
sentences.cn: 口味甘甜, 结构分明, 单宁柔软, 回味美好.

sentences.en: The method of sulfomethylation modification of bayberry tannin extract was investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了毛杨梅栲胶的磺甲基化改性方法.

sentences.en: The risin and tannin that can be extracted from it are sought by the chemical industry.
sentences.cn: 从中提取的松香和鞣酸是化学工业上很需要的.

sentences.en: Vegetable tannin extracts have been widely used in leather industry.
sentences.cn: 摘要栲胶已在制革工业获得了广泛的应用.

sentences.en: Walnut sticks intradermal more tannin, easy to form an isolation layer interface.
sentences.cn: 核桃枝皮内单宁较多, 易形成接口的隔离层.

trans.tran_en: a reddish acid used in preparing leather, making ink etc
